ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control
ModMetaData.author: VouLT
ModMetaData.description:
Bulk assignment of colonists and animals to outfits, areas, drugs, food, work in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.
Features: - Policies presets for Work, Schedule, Assign and Animal tabs - Default outfits, food, drugs when colonist, prisoners or slaves join your colony - Emergency' button to toggle your configured policies at once in one click or keyboard shorcut
v2.7.5 - Updated translations; Fixed AssignTab policies Copy-Paste bug v2.7.4 - Added Medical UI + Compatibility with Misc. Robots + Improved integration with Achtung! Rescue job v2.7.3 - RimWorld v1.5 + Reading defaults + Updated translations + Bug fixes
Mod Integrations List: - Fluffly's Work Tab (full integration!) - Fluffly's Animal Tab - Numbers - Combat Extended - Assign Animal Food - Children, school and learning - WeaponsTabReborn - Misc. Robots
